query.value: @concat('SELECT T0."DocNum" "Num.OC SAP",T0."BPLName" "Sucursal",T3."CardCode" "Cod.Proveedor",T3."CardName" "Nom.Proveedor",T1."Project" "Proyecto",T1."U_Partida" "Partida",T1."ItemCode" "Cod.Articulo",T1."Dscription" "Nom.Articulo",T1."unitMsr" "Unidad Medida",T1."Quantity" "Cantidad",T1."Price" "Precio por Unidad",T1."LineTotal" "Total (ML)",CASE WHEN (T0."CANCELED" = ''Y'') THEN ''Cancelada'' WHEN (T0."CANCELED" = ''N'') and (T0."DocStatus" = ''C'') THEN ''Cerrada'' WHEN (T0."CANCELED" = ''N'') and (T0."DocStatus" = ''O'') and (T0."Printed" = ''Y'') THEN ''Abierta-Imprimida'' WHEN (T0."CANCELED" = ''N'') and (T0."DocStatus" = ''O'') and (T0."Printed" = ''N'') THEN ''Abierta'' ELSE ''--'' END "Estado OC", (SELECT first_value(T112."U_NAME" ORDER BY T111."UpdateDate" desc, T111."UpdateTime" desc) FROM "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OWDD" T100 INNER JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."WDD1" T111 ON T111."WddCode" = T100."WddCode" LEFT JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OUSR" T112 ON T111."UserID" = T112."USERID" WHERE T111."Status" IN (''Y'', ''N'', ''W'') AND T100."ObjType" in (22) and T100."IsDraft" in(''N'') and T100."DocEntry" is not null and T100."DocEntry" = T0."DocEntry") "Aprobacion", T1."FreeTxt" "Texto Libre", (T1."Quantity" - T1."OpenCreQty") "Cant.Recibida", CASE WHEN EXISTS(select T4."DocEntry" from "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."PCH1" T4 INNER JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OPCH" T7 ON T4."DocEntry" = T7."DocEntry" INNER JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."PDN1" T5 ON T4."BaseEntry" = T5."DocEntry" INNER JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OPDN" T8 ON T5."DocEntry"  = T8."DocEntry" INNER JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."POR1" T6 ON T5."BaseEntry" = T6."DocEntry" where T4."BaseType" = 20 and T5."BaseType" = 22 and T7."CANCELED" = ''N'' AND T8."CANCELED" = ''N'' and T6."DocEntry" = T0."DocEntry") THEN ''SI'' ELSE ''NO'' END "Facturado",T1."OpenCreQty" "Cant.Pendiente",T1."BaseRef" "Solicitud de Compra",T0."TaxDate" "Fec.OC",T0."DocDate" "Fec.Contabilizacion",T1."WhsCode" "Almacen",(SELECT first_value(T100."DraftEntry" ORDER BY T100."DraftEntry") FROM "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OWDD" T100 INNER JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."WDD1" T111 ON T111."WddCode" = T100."WddCode" LEFT JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OUSR" T112 ON T111."UserID" = T112."USERID" WHERE T111."Status" IN (''Y'', ''N'', ''W'') AND T100."ObjType" in (22) and T100."IsDraft" in(''N'') and T100."DocEntry" is not null and T100."DocEntry" = T0."DocEntry") "Clave Doc.Preliminar",T0."Comments" "Comentarios",T1."ShipDate" "Fec.Entrega" FROM "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OPOR" T0 INNER JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."POR1" T1 ON T0."DocEntry" = T1."DocEntry" INNER JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OCRD" T3 ON T0."CardCode" = T3."CardCode" LEFT JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OUSR" T2 ON T0."UserSign" = T2."USERID" WHERE T0."BPLId" = 32 AND (T0."TaxDate" >= ''',formatDateTime(pipeline().parameters.fch_inicio,'yyyy/MM/dd'),''' AND T0."TaxDate" <= ''',formatDateTime(addHours(utcnow(),-6),'yyyy/MM/dd'),''') ORDER BY T0."TaxDate", T0."DocNum"')

source.query:
select PV."CardCode", PV."CardName", PV."CardName" ALIAS, PV."IndustryC" Tipo_BANCO 
from "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OCRD" PV
Where PV."IndustryC" = 1
order by 1

select  UF."Rate" UF, UF."RateDate" FECHA from "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."ORTT" UF
Where UF."Currency" = 'UF'
order by UF."RateDate"

SELECT 
FAC."FolioNum",
FAC."Project" ,
PY."PrjName"  ,           
DAYS_BETWEEN ( TO_DATE(FAC."DocDate"), 
TO_DATE(CURRENT_DATE))-1 "DIAS",
FAC."BPLId",
FAC."BPLName"  ,                              
CASE WHEN CO."U_tipoempresa" in ('MANQ SERVICIOS','MANQ DESARROLLO') THEN 'INMOBILIARIA'
      WHEN CO."U_tipoempresa" in ('GRUPO PIEDRA ROJA') THEN 'MACROLOTE'
      ELSE CO."U_tipoempresa" END "UNIDAD DE NEGOCIO",
SN."GroupCode",
GC."GroupName",         
(FAC."DocTotal" - FAC."PaidToDate") SALDO,
FAC."DocNum",
FAC."CANCELED",
FAC."DocDate",          
FAC."DocDueDate",         
FAC."CardCode",  
FAC."CardName",                                                            
FAC."DocTotal",
FAC."PaidToDate",
FAC."SysRate",
FAC."DocTotalSy",
FAC."Indicator"
FROM "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OPCH" FAC
LEFT  JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OPRJ" PY ON FAC."Project" = PY."PrjCode"
INNER JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OCRD" SN ON FAC."CardCode" = SN."CardCode"
INNER JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OBPL" CO ON FAC."BPLId" = CO."BPLId"
INNER JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OCRG" GC ON SN."GroupCode" = GC."GroupCode"
WHERE FAC."CANCELED" = 'N'
AND FAC."DocSubType" IN ('DM','--')
AND FAC."DocDate" >= '2022-06-01'
AND (FAC."DocTotal" - FAC."PaidToDate") > 0
AND FAC."BPLId" <> 41
AND GC."GroupCode" IN (115)
ORDER BY FAC."BPLId",FAC."DocDate"

SELECT 'Entrada de Mercancias Interna' "Tipo_Documento",T1."Project" "Cod_Proyecto",T2."PrjName" "Nom_Proyecto",T1."U_Partida" "Partida",
(SELECT T100."U_Description" FROM "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."@EXX_PRE3" T100 WHERE T100."U_DocEntry" = T1."U_PresEntry" and T100."U_Code" = T1."U_Partida") "Nom_Partida",
T3."Segment_0" "Num_Cuenta_Contable",T3."AcctName" "Cuenta_Contable",T4."RefDate" "Fecha_Registro_Contable",T4."Number" "Numero_Asiento",T4."TransId" "Num_Trasaccion",T0."DocNum" "Num_Doc_Origen",
T1."OcrCode" "CeCo",T10."OcrName" "Nombre CeCo",T1."OcrCode2" "Segmento Negocio",T12."OcrName" "Nombre Segmento Negocio",T1."OcrCode3" "Area Negocio",T13."OcrName" "Nombre Area Negocio",
T1."OcrCode4" "Concepto Gasto",T14."OcrName" "Nombre Concepto Gasto",T1."LineTotal" "Credito",T1."TotalSumSy" "Credito UF",0 "Debito",0 "Debito UF",T4."Memo" "Glosa",
T15."U_NAME" "Creador Asiento",T0."Comments" "Comentarios" ,T4."RefDate"
FROM "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."IGN1" T1 
INNER JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OIGN" T0 ON T1."DocEntry" = T0."DocEntry" 
LEFT JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OPRJ" T2 ON T2."PrjCode" = T1."Project" 
LEFT JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OACT" T3 ON T3."AcctCode" = T1."AcctCode" 
LEFT JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OJDT" T4 ON T4."TransId" = T0."TransId" 
LEFT JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OOCR" T10 ON T1."OcrCode" = T10."OcrCode" 
LEFT JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OOCR" T12 ON T1."OcrCode2" = T12."OcrCode" 
LEFT JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OOCR" T13 ON T1."OcrCode3" = T13."OcrCode" 
LEFT JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OOCR" T14 ON T1."OcrCode4" = T14."OcrCode" 
LEFT JOIN "SBO_MANQUEHUE"."OUSR" T15 ON T0."UserSign" = T15."USERID" 
where T3."Segment_0" IN ('5101101','5101102','5101201','5101202','5101203','5101204','5101205','5101206','5101207','5101401','5101402','5101403','5101404','5101405') 
and T0."BPLId" = 32 AND T0."ObjType" = 59 
AND (T4."RefDate" >= '2022-07-01')
ORDER BY T4."RefDate" ASC

userProperties.name: Source
userProperties.value: imsa-files/@{'Modelo Flujo de Caja/Forecast/Forecast Proyectos Actuales'}/@{'BD forecast FC.xlsx'}

parameters.Folder: Modelo Flujo de Caja/Forecast/Forecast Proyectos Actuales

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT *
FROM dim.ProyectoEtapa
where etapagestion is not null and act = 1 and TipoActivo = 'Proyecto Inmobiliario'
order by idproyectoetapa desc

SELECT max(idFecha) as idFecha,
cast(Anho as Int) as Anho,
NumeroMesCero
FROM dbo.Fecha
GROUP BY Anho, NumeroMesCero
